table.description: Create a new data table for an entity
instructions: Configure filters in table-config.ts based on your API response
Update the type definition in columns.tsx with your data fields
Add column definitions for your entity in columns.tsx
Implement the getData() function in page.tsx to fetch your data
Customize search and filter behavior in table-config.ts
Note: Ensure your column displays the field that corresponds to your defined filter for proper functionality
